name: Funk mandelão
description: Simple lyricism, raw and minimalistic production, and distinct drops with bursting bass.

children.name: Beat bruxaria
children.description: São Paulo-originated Funk brasileiro with aggressive, distorted and high-pitched beats featuring minimalistic percussion and diversified sampling.

children.name: Brazilian Phonk
children.description: Merges Funk automotivo's rhythms, vocals, and energy, with the energetic and nocturnal production typical of the Drift Phonk scene, and Phonk House.

children.name: Funk automotivo
children.description: Catchy, repetitive synths accompanied by a strong four-on-the-floor kick and loud, reverberated vocals.

children.name: Ritmada
children.description: Short, repetitive and resonant beats with more danceable, immersive grooves drawn out of Afro-Brazilian instrumentation, a cleaner, more radio-friendly sound and greater focus on lyrics.
